overview: With Wei Hong’s dreams and memories complicatedly mixed, he chooses to head back to Kampung Gajah to look for his ex-girlfriend. However, he finds himself estranged. This leads him to rely on vague memories to explore his roots, but finds that there is no trace of anything.
tagline: A filmmaker relies on vague memories to explore his roots, but finds that there is no trace of anything.
title: Kampung Gajah
